description: At the moment there is only a WARNING in the logs about unknown base images in the image cache. There should be an option to directly remove unknown base images.
title: unknown base images in the image cache should be directly removed

comments.content: At the moment there is only a WARNING in the logs about unknown base images in the image cache. There should be an option to directly remove unknown base images.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt

comments.content: That's already covered by appending unknown base files to the removable_base_files list.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt
